SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - Absenteeism score.
Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - Activity impairment score.
Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - Are you currently employed (working for pay)?
Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - During the past seven days, how many hours did you actually work?
Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - During the past seven days, how many hours did you miss from work because of your health problems?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WPAI-GH Version 2 - Hours Miss Work Health Problems

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - During the past seven days, how many hours did you miss from work because of any other reason, such as vacation, holidays, time off to participate in this study?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WPAI-GH Version 2 - Hours Miss Work Other Reason

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - Presenteeism score.

Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - During the past seven days, how much did your health problems affect your ability to do your regular daily activities, other than work at a job?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WPAI-GH Version 2 - Problems Affect Daily Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - During the past seven days, how much did your health problems affect your productivity while you were working?
Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - Work productivity loss score.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WPAI-GH Version 2 - Work Productivity Loss Score
